item.title: 安赛乐米塔尔与 IDC 结束南非独家谈判，未达成任何协议
item.description: 安赛乐米塔尔公司（ArcelorMittal SA）与南非最大的开发金融机构就其可能出售当地钢铁业务的独家谈判无果而终，该公司可自由寻找其他投资者。【原文：ArcelorMittal SA’s exclusive talks with South Africa’s biggest development-finance institution regarding its potential sale of its local steel operation have ended without a deal, leaving the company free to seek other investors.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称塞内加尔应自行决定如何处理债务问题
item.description: 国际货币基金组织表示，它已与塞内加尔探讨了各种方案，以解决该国 "严重的债务脆弱性"，但如何处理这一问题将由政府决定。【原文：The International Monetary Fund said it’s explored various options with Senegal to tackle the nation’s “significant debt vulnerabilities,” though it’s up to the government to decide how it deals with the issue.】

item.title: 匈牙利将放宽预算，银行将因欧尔班选举支出而遭殃
item.description: 匈牙利总理维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）在大选前的大手大脚迫使政府提高预算赤字目标，额外资金将来自银行税和外币债券。【原文：Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban’s pre-election spending is forcing the government to raise its budget deficit targets, with extra funding to be sourced from banking taxes and foreign-currency bonds.】

item.title: 大多数印度炼油商放弃购买 12 月份的俄罗斯原油
item.description: 印度已经缩减了 12 月份到货的俄罗斯原油采购量，这表明西方制裁和与美国的贸易谈判对购买模式产生了重大影响。【原文：India has scaled back purchases of Russian crude for arrival in December, showing that Western sanctions and trade talks with the US are having a major impact on buying patterns.】

item.title: 戴夫-刘易斯（Dave Lewis）在蒸馏酒商帝亚吉欧（Diageo）面临又一次扭亏为盈的挑战
item.description: 戴夫-刘易斯（Dave Lewis）曾带领一家因丑闻而市场份额不断下滑的连锁超市，提高了其利润和销售额，巩固了乐购公司作为英国最大杂货商的地位，因此被称为 "扭亏专家"。【原文：Dave Lewis became known as a turnaround expert by taking a scandal-hit supermarket chain that was losing market share, boosting its profit and sales and cementing Tesco Plc’s position as the UK’s biggest grocer.】

item.title: 耐克交易后，H&M 支持的 Syre 希望获得 7 亿美元新资金
item.description: 瑞典纺织初创企业 Syre AB 计划筹集多达 7 亿美元的新资金，用于在越南建厂，此前该公司与耐克公司（Nike Inc.【原文：Swedish textile startup Syre AB plans to raise as much as $700 million in fresh funding to build a factory in Vietnam, following a supply deal with Nike Inc. that it says will help unlock new borrowing.】

item.title: 花旗银行预计 2026 年印尼股市将创历史新高
item.description: 据花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Indonesian stocks are poised to climb 10% to a fresh all-time high next year, supported by government spending and potential interest-rate cuts, according to Citigroup Inc.】

item.title: 据说华宝旗下的 Truhome Finance 正在掂量 3 亿美元的印度上市计划
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，华平投资公司（Warburg Pincus LLC）旗下的 Truhome Finance Ltd. 正在考虑进行首次公开募股，可能会筹集约 3 亿美元或更多资金。【原文：Warburg Pincus LLC’s Truhome Finance Ltd. is considering an initial public offering that could raise about $300 million or more, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 就业市场降温，英国失业率创科维德事件以来新高
item.description: 英国失业率升幅超过预期，促使交易商加大了对英国央行下月降息的押注。【原文：UK unemployment rose more than expected, prompting traders to add to bets on a Bank of England interest-rate cut next month.】

item.title: Adyen 预测 2026 年后年净收入增长 20
item.description: 阿迪恩公司（Adyen NV）周二表示，预计 2026 年后任何一年的净收入增长率都将达到 20% 左右，这为投资者判断这家荷兰支付处理商的增长轨迹提供了新的标准。【原文：Adyen NV expects net revenue growth at about 20% in any given year post 2026, it said Tuesday, handing investors a fresh yardstick to judge the Dutch payment processor’s growth trajectory.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：9 月份工资增长意外放缓
软银出人意料地以 58 亿美元卸下英伟达股份
item.description: 软银集团公司（SoftBank Group Corp）出售了其在英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp）的全部股份，在创始人孙正义（Masayoshi Son）计划进行一系列投资以建立自己的人工智能势力范围之前，将 58 亿美元收入囊中。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. sold its entire stake in Nvidia Corp., pocketing $5.8 billion ahead of a rash of planned investments by founder Masayoshi Son to build his own sphere of influence supporting artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 中国收紧国有企业增加外债的规定
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国正在加大一些国有企业的海外借贷难度，扩大控制地方政府债务风险的行动。【原文：China is making it harder for some state-owned companies to borrow overseas, expanding a campaign to rein in local government debt risks, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 结束停摆，买入跌势
item.description:
民主党人正试图找出问题所在。资产价格从不关心。【原文：

Democrats are trying to figure out what went wrong. Asset prices never cared.

】

item.title: 中国人民银行推动人民币海外借款以实现货币国际化
item.description: 中国央行誓言要进一步鼓励海外实体以人民币融资，并打赌低廉的借贷成本和海外对人民币需求的增加将成为人民币全球化的重要推动力。【原文：China’s central bank vowed to further encourage financing in the yuan by overseas entities, betting cheap borrowing costs and increased demand for the currency offshore will be crucial drivers for its globalization.】

item.title: 荷兰国际集团（ING）称印度卢比有望随着贸易希望的升温而反弹
item.description: 据荷兰国际集团银行（ING Bank NV）称，印度卢比是明年亚洲高收益货币中最有上涨潜力的货币，该银行表示，与美国达成贸易协议可能会推动印度卢比反弹，而印度卢比今年的表现远远落后于大多数同类货币。【原文：The Indian rupee offers the most potential for gains among Asia’s high yielding currencies next year, according to ING Bank NV, which said a trade deal with the US could fuel a rally in a currency that has lagged far behind most of its peers this year.】

item.title: 达纳塔拉削减资金，加鲁达机队增长面临风险
item.description: 印尼主权财富基金达纳塔拉（Danantara）正在减少对印尼鹰航空公司（PT Garuda Indonesia）的财政支持，使这家陷入困境的航空公司更新机队的能力受到质疑。【原文：Indonesia’s sovereign wealth fund Danantara is reducing its financial support for flag carrier PT Garuda Indonesia, putting in doubt the distressed airline’s ability to refresh its fleet.】

item.title: 美国大学秋季入学人数连续第三年增长
item.description: 根据美国国家学生信息交换所（National Student Clearinghouse）的初步数据，今年秋季，美国高校的入学人数连续第三年增长。总人数增长了2%，其中本科生人数增长了2.4%。【原文：US colleges and universities recorded a third year of enrollment growth this fall, according to preliminary data from the National Student Clearinghouse. Total headcount rose 2%, with undergraduate enrollment up 2.4%.】

item.title: 乌克兰无人机行业的下一个目标是北约市场
item.description:
乌克兰国防公司渴望获得资金以跟上俄罗斯的步伐，而西方盟国也在寻求建立自己的无人机武库，乌克兰国防公司称出口终于提上了日程。【原文：

Hungry for cash to keep pace with Russia, and with western allies seeking to build up their drone arsenals, Ukraine’s defense companies say exports are finally on the agenda.

】

item.title: 高盛预计本周预算案公布后南非评级将上调
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.）预计，南非公共财政的改善将为周五的主权信用评级升级铺平道路。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. expects an improvement in South Africa’s public finances to pave the way for a sovereign credit-rating upgrade on Friday, days after Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana delivers a budget update.】

item.title: 印度 Neuberg 诊断公司据称将于 2026 年进行 3.5 亿美元的首次公开募股
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Neuberg Diagnostics Pvt.公司正计划进行首次公开募股，可能为这家印度临床实验室检测连锁企业筹集约3.5亿美元的资金。【原文：Neuberg Diagnostics Pvt. is said to be planning an initial public offering that could raise about $350 million for the Indian clinical laboratory-testing chain, according to people familiar with the matter, adding to flurry of deals in the country’s hot IPO market.】

item.title: 创鑫铝业据称将在香港首次公开募股中募集 7 亿美元资金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国铝冶炼企业创鑫实业控股有限公司计划在香港首次公开募股，募集资金约 7 亿美元。【原文：Chuangxin Industries Holdings Ltd., a Chinese aluminum smelter, is planning for its initial public offering in Hong Kong to fetch about $700 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 沙特金融科技初创企业 Lean 探索上市道路上的交易
item.description: 沙特金融科技初创公司 Lean Technologies 正在探索新的投资，因为它希望在可能上市之前扩大产品范围。【原文：Saudi fintech startup Lean Technologies is exploring new investments as it seeks to expand its product offerings ahead of a possible public listing.】

item.title: 锂观察家将关注点从供应担忧转向存储需求
item.description: 锂电行业正在掀起一股大规模电池储能需求的热潮，盖过了最近扰乱市场的中国供应方焦虑。【原文：The lithium industry is riding a wave of excitement over demand for large-scale battery storage, overshadowing the supply-side anxiety in China that has recently roiled the market.】

item.title: 赢得 LG 和 SBI 基金后，Genspark 成为最新的人工智能独角兽企业
item.description: 人工智能代理构建商 Genspark 公司在最新一轮融资中从包括 LG 集团投资部门在内的投资者那里获得了超过 2 亿美元的资金，成为人工智能领域最新一家市值达十亿美元的初创公司。【原文：AI agent builder Genspark Inc. has secured more than $200 million from investors including LG Group’s investment arm in its latest funding round, becoming the newest billion-dollar startup in the artificial intelligence arena.】

item.title: 中国向私人投资开放国家主导领域
item.description: 中国正在通过提高所有权限制和取消一些投资壁垒，进一步向私人资本开放几个主要的国有主导产业。【原文：China is further opening up several major state-dominated industries to private capital by raising the ownership limit and removing some investment barriers.】

item.title: 中国习近平容忍最富裕省份增长相对缓慢
item.description: 习近平主席表示，中国最富裕省份的经济增长相对乏力是可以接受的，这是世界第二大经济体高层领导人容忍经济增长放缓的最新迹象。【原文：President Xi Jinping indicated that the relatively lackluster expansion of China’s richest province is acceptable, in the latest sign that senior leaders of the world’s second largest economy are tolerating slower growth.】

item.title: 日本 30 年期债券销售需求低于 12 个月平均水平
item.description: 日本 30 年期国债周二的拍卖需求弱于 12 个月的平均水平，原因是对首相佐那江隆一财政政策的担忧再次引发了投资者的谨慎情绪。【原文：Japan’s 30-year government bond auction Tuesday saw demand that was weaker than the 12-month average, as renewed concerns about Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s fiscal policy drove investor caution.】

item.title: 软银加入罢免 GoTo 首席执行官的行动，为 Grab 交易铺平道路
item.description: 软银集团（SoftBank Group Corp）、Provident Capital Partners 和 Peak XV 等知名 GoTo 集团支持者正在寻求撤换首席执行官帕特里克-瓦鲁乔（Patrick Walujo），这一戏剧性转折可能会加速 Grab 控股有限公司（Grab Holdings Ltd. ）的收购谈判。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp., Provident Capital Partners and Peak XV are among a group of prominent GoTo Group backers seeking to replace Chief Executive Officer Patrick Walujo, a dramatic twist that could accelerate talks about an acquisition by Grab Holdings Ltd.】

item.title: 索尼上调盈利预期，动漫为强劲业绩注入动力
item.description: 索尼集团公司（Sony Group Corp）上调了利润预期，并公布了高于预期的盈利报告，这主要得益于其强大的娱乐产品组合。【原文：Sony Group Corp. raised its profit outlook and reported stronger-than-expected earnings, buoyed by its strong entertainment portfolio.】
